```{r}
Pregnancy <- prep.Pregnancy.data()
Movement <- prep.Movement.data()
HuntEvents <- prep.HuntEvents.data()
FCMStress <- prep.FCMStress.data()

# save as RDS
saveRDS(Pregnancy, "data/Pregnancy.RDS")
saveRDS(Movement, "data/Movement.RDS")
saveRDS(HuntEvents, "data/HuntEvents.RDS")
saveRDS(FCMStress, "data/FCMStress.RDS")
```

```{r}
Groups <- get.Herds(Movement, enclosures)
Stress <- CalcSenderPosDist(Movement, HuntEvents)
# save as RDS
saveRDS(Groups, "data/Groups.RDS")
saveRDS(Stress, "data/Stress.RDS")
```


```{r}
data.intermediate <- Datafusion(Movement, Pregnancy, Stress, Groups)
data.full <- Assign_FCMData(FCMStress,
                            data.intermediate,
                            gut.retention.threshold = c(9, 29),
                            distance.threshold = 5000,
                            ignore.filters = FALSE)
```
